faqs.q: How many calories in a teaspoon of olive oil?
Is olive oil high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, 4.5 g of fat per teaspoon, mostly healthy monounsaturated fats.

faqs.q: Does olive oil have carbs or protein?
faqs.a: No carbs, fiber, sugars, or protein—it's 100% fat.

faqs.q: What's the difference in calories between extra virgin and regular olive oil?
faqs.a: Negligible difference; both about 40 kcal per teaspoon.

faqs.q: How does olive oil compare to butter per teaspoon?
faqs.a: Similar calories (olive oil 40 kcal, butter ~36 kcal), but olive oil has healthier fats.
